long_description: The compact, wash-and-wear Urbanears Humlan Headphones pack big sound and sport a sleek design with minimal parts. The headband and ear cushions can be easily removed and thrown in the wash. Dynamic sounds and sleek, minimalist design are sure to make these headphones an instant favorite. ZoundPlug socket lets you share your music with a friend; simply plug another pair of headphones in via the empty outlet on the ear cap and enjoy your tunes together. Built-in microphone and remote allow for picking up calls and hands-free talking. Urbanears Humlan earbuds feature a tangle-resistant cord with a 3.5mm stereo plug.
short_description: The compact, wash-and-wear Urbanears Humlan Headphones pack big sound and sport a sleek design with minimal parts. The headband and ear cushions can be easily removed and thrown in the wash.
